officialTitle: Remote Breast Cancer Screening Based on Automated Breast Ultrasound Among Chinese Women: a Multi-center, Prospective, Cohort Study
conditions: Breast Cancer, Mass Screening, Cancer Screening, Ultrasound Imaging, AI (Artificial Intelligence)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The performance of breast cancer screening based on AB US with remote reading mode
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Any age at 35 and over
2. Screening breast cancer with AB US
3. Obtaining written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

1. symptoms of breast cancer
2. surgical of breast within 12 months prior to the study
3. known diagnosis breast cancer
4. poor image quality
5. follow-up was less than 12 months
